messages.title: Labour will invest in our Police
messages.content: Under the Tory and Tory/Lib Dem governments, Greater Manchester police have lost over a quarter of staff since 2010, and the strain shows. "Too many south Manchester residents are worried about levels of anti-social behavior, fly-tipping, speeding and graffiti. We need a proper support for our police so we can get action on local crime. I am pleased to have supported the work our police and council officers are doing. And I will always press for investment in the police - whoever is in government," said Jeff.

I recently asked Theresa May who she'd rather see in government - someone like me, who could stand up for the area or one of her Conservative candidates who'll vote to give the Tories a blank cheque to do as they please.
She couldn't answer!

Theresa May wants you to think she called this snap general election because of Brexit. However, people are starting to realize her real aim is to win a big Tory majority and claim this as a mandate to impose more cuts on our community
